author: jih2nn
content: I've checked running Kurtosis with Gloas at epoch 0 and eip7805 at epoch 1 working fine. Dora didn't show any ILs but I guess this is related to client implementation. I think current toolings are ready to proceed with rebasing onto Gloas (without ePBS). Let me know if any problem occurs! cc <@993802539856314398>

content: I haven't tried it. Maybe you need to set `perfect_peerdas_enabled: true` at network_params or it's related to this one: https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/892088344438255616/1410295130107154614
